trans-unit.source: Files you've previously accessed will show up here
trans-unit.target: 以前访问过的文件和文件夹将显示在此处

trans-unit.source: Open a specific page or pages

To get started, you'll need to grant us permission to display your files. This will open a Settings page where you can grant us this permission. You'll need to reopen the app once you've completed this step.
trans-unit.target: 请授权我们访问你的文件系统。设置将会打开，然后您可以选择授权。在完成设置后需要重启应用程序。

trans-unit.source: is a subfolder of the source folder
trans-unit.target: 是源文件夹的子文件夹
注意: 这些是实验性功能。

trans-unit.source: An item with this name already exists in this directory.
trans-unit.target: 目标目录已存在同名项。

trans-unit.source: We weren't able to delete this item
Please insert the necessary drive to access this item.
The file you are attempting to access may have been moved or deleted.
trans-unit.target: 访问目标文件可能已被移动或删除。

trans-unit.source: The file you are attempting to preview may have been moved or deleted.
trans-unit.target: 预览目标文件可能已被移动或删除。

trans-unit.source: The folder you are attempting to access may have been moved or deleted.
trans-unit.target: 访问目标文件夹可能已被移动或删除。
确实要删除此文件夹吗？

trans-unit.source: The file you're trying to delete is currently being used by an another application.
trans-unit.target: 删除目标文件正被其他应用程序使用。

trans-unit.source: The requested operation is not supported
The item name must not contain the following characters: \ / : * ? " < > |
trans-unit.target: 文件名不能包含下列任何字符：\ / : * ? " < > |

trans-unit.source: The item name must not contain the following characters: \ / : * ? " < > |

trans-unit.target: 正在将文件移动到回收站

trans-unit.source: Please check the password and try again.

trans-unit.target: 无法访问要显示的任何项

trans-unit.source: The source and destination file names are the same.
trans-unit.target: 源文件名和目标文件名相同。

trans-unit.source: The destination folder is the same as the source folder.
trans-unit.target: 目标文件夹与源文件夹相同。

trans-unit.source: Files ran into a problem that the developers didn't prepare for yet.
The item referenced is either invalid or inaccessible.{0}Error message:{0}{1}
trans-unit.target: 引用的项无效或无法访问。{0}代码:{0}{1}

trans-unit.source: There's nothing to share right now...
trans-unit.target: 目前没有可共享的内容。

trans-unit.source: The items you've selected will be shared
The selected item will be shared
The item you're attempting to rename no longer exists. Please verify the correct location of the item you need to rename.
trans-unit.target: 您正在尝试重命名的项不存在。请确认您需要重命名项的正确位置。

trans-unit.source: The name specified was invalid. Please check the desired item name and try again.
trans-unit.target: 指定的名称无效。请检查项名称并重试。

trans-unit.source: The length of the item name specified exceeds the maximum limit. Please check the desired name and try again.
trans-unit.target: 指定的项名称长度超出最大限制。请检查名称并重试。

trans-unit.source: The application needs to be restarted in order to apply these settings, would you like to restart the app?
trans-unit.target: 应用程序需要重新启动才能应用这些设置，你想重新启动应用程序吗？

trans-unit.source: Choose a type for this new item below
trans-unit.target: 从下方选择新项的类型

trans-unit.source: We weren't able to create this item
The device can now be safely removed from the computer.
trans-unit.target: 现在可以安全地从计算机中删除该设备。

trans-unit.source: This device is currently in use. Close any programs, windows or tabs that might be using the device, and then try again.
trans-unit.target: 该设备正在使用中。关闭可能正在使用该设备的所有应用程序，然后重试。

trans-unit.source:
*Personal Information Collection* Files does not collect, store, share or publish any personal information.
*Non-personal Information Collection*
We use App Center to keep track of app usage, find bugs, and fix crashes. All information sent to App Center is anonymous and free of any user or contextual data.
trans-unit.target:
*个人信息收集*
Files 不收集、存储、共享或发布任何个人信息。
*非个人信息收集*
我们通过应用商店跟踪应用程序的使用情况，定位bug，并修复可能导致崩溃的因素。发送到应用商店的信息均以匿名形式发送，且不包含任何用户或相关数据。

trans-unit.source: This setting modifies system files and can have unexpected side effects on your device. The developers take no responsibility in the event an issue occurs as a result. Continuing with this option is an acknowledgment of the risks involved with this action. Please note, uninstalling Files will not undo these changes and may prevent you from opening file explorer unless you turn off this setting before removing Files from your device.
trans-unit.target: 此设置会修改系统文件，在你的设备上可能引起一些未知的副作用。如果出现问题，开发人员不承担任何责任。继续使用此设置表示承认此风险。请注意，卸载Files前请关闭此设置，否则，Files无法撤销这些修改，会导致无法打开文件管理器。
